articles.title: Vishal Katti
articles.description: This site, just like me, is under development!

            Bio
            Vishal Katti resides in Bengaluru, India with his wife and 3yo daughter, but constantly longs for the sun and sands of Goa where he spent most of his childhood.
            
            
            Education
            Dr. B. R. Ambedkar National Institute of Technology (NIT) | Jalandhar, Punjab, India Bachelor of Technology in Instrumentation & Control Engineering | Aug 2005 - Apr 2010
            Smt. Parvatibai Chowgule College of Arts & Science | Margao, Goa, India H.S.S.C. in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics | Jun 2003 - Apr 2005
            
            
            Experience
            Mindtree Ltd. | Business Data Analyst | Sep 2021 to Present
            ExxonMobil Services & Technology Pvt. Ltd. | Business Analytics Advisor | Jun 2018 - Aug 2021
            Tata Consultancy Services | Functional Consultant/Data Analyst | Sep 2010 - Jun 2018
